message: I'm feeling generous, but let's make it snappy. Time is money.
Come on, meet me in the middle
This is my final offer. Take it or leave it, the clock is ticking!
You're running out of time, not me
Okay, Alice. Let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the only fair option. Take it before inflation eats away at this deal any further.
Your 50/50 split was too little, too late
